Insooni

Korean: 인순이

Full name:

Birthday:

Age:
68 years old
Group (2023-present):
Golden Girls

Introduction

Kim In-soon, better known by her stage name Insooni, is a Korean-American singer who made her debut in 1978 as a member of Hee Sisters before becoming a household name in South Korea, with the release of her hit solo digital single "If it's night, every night" in 1983.

Insooni was born to a South Korean mother and an African American father, who served in the U.S. military in South Korea and was brought up by her mother alone, with the assistance of Pearl S. Buck International's child sponsorship program.
